msbt.message: There you are, ! As you can see, my dear, I took your advice and moved to this island! As you can also see, I am totally unable to entertain anyone at the moment. It's quite embarrassing. But I should have this cleaned up by tomorrow, so let's take some time to catch up soon, .

Oh my! , did you come all the way here just to see little ol' me? You just HAD to see for yourself, didn't you, my dear?Well, here I am! I picked up and moved to just like you suggested. Now, I have GOT to finish unpacking. But thank you for stopping by to check in on me, .

Well, Are you surprised?As you can see, I wasted no time moving to this island. And what a charming island it is! It was love at first sight. Really! And I have you to thank for inviting me here, . Oh! I do hope it continues to live up to my expectations!Well, I should be all settled in by tomorrow. Then we can start talking each other's ears off!

! Can you believe it? I moved to the island, just like you asked! You didn't doubt me, now, did you? Well, even if you did, it's a lovely island and everyone is delightful. Best of all, YOU'RE here! And I can't thank you enough. This was just what I needed, .

Why, !I told you I would come, and here I am, !To tell you the truth, I started packing right after you invited me.And now, at last, I can take a break from UNpacking and start enjoying life on this island! But first, I must thank you for introducing me to my marvelous new home. You are simply the best!

! Can you believe I managed to make it to the island in one piece? I can barely believe it myself. Anyhoo, I'm very sorry it's taken me a while to say hello. It's just I've been so busy falling in love with ! I'm SO glad you asked me to move here! Well, neighbor, I look forward to seeing you around, !

Why, hello there! Remember me?<10_4 /> I'm . I used to live on !You invited me to come live on this island, remember? Well, after that, I moved here almost right away!I must say, I didn't see you around for so long, I was worried you'd moved away. I'm so glad you didn't.

Oh! ! You came to see meYou invited me to move here, so I did But then I went and caught this horrid cold. Ugh, I'm so sorry. I have so much I want to tell you, bu—bu—buhhh—but it'll have to wait until I beat this, .

Well, if it isn't ! Surprised to see me here?You see, invited me to move to the island, so I did! I live here now! Isn't it wonderful? But enough of that. I still have this enormous mess to sort out.Just you wait and see. I'll have this entire place in tip-top shape by the end of today!

Oh, ! You'll never guess what! insisted that I move to this island.So here I am! I'm a resident as of TODAY! Just like you!I simply can't wait to get to know each other better, neighbor.But first, I must whip this place into shape by the end of the day. I can't stand a mess, you know.

Oh, ! I wonder, did tell you the news about me yet?They suggested that I move HERE! So, I packed my bags and left behind. Now, I'm still new to the island, so it would be just lovely if you could show me the ropes sometime.

If it isn't ! Can you guess what I'm doing here on your island? Wellll, you might have already heard it from , but I live here now! They invited me! I've been looking forward to running into you, darling! It'll be so lovely to see you around the island!

My goodness, ! I haven't seen you in ages, even though we live on the same island.Yes, you heard right I live here now! suggested I move here, so I did just that! I'm so sorry I didn't get a chance to say hello sooner, but let's not be strangers anymore, .

I'm terribly sorry I haven't had a chance to say hello to you yet. You see said I should relocate to this island, sohere I am, and sick as can be. Oh curlers! I hate for you to see me like this Let's talk when I'm better company, .

Well, well, fancy meeting you here, . Darling, you are NOT going to believe this, but I JUST moved here! It's true!But listen to this I decided to move to this island because I was invited by a friend of mine who lived here. When I arrived, I discovered that my friend had up and moved away! Can you believe it?! So RUDE!Well, I won't let that bother me. YOU live here, and that's what really matters, .

! You have NO idea how much I was hoping I'd run into you, ! You see, I was invited to move to this island. So, silly me, I up and left behind. When I arrived here, I discovered that the person who invited me doesn't even live here anymore! Oh, , seeing your friendly face makes me feel so much less out of place. Now, I mustn't go on wallowing in self-pity. It's terrible for my complexion. I'll be fine! I truly will!

Oh, Are you surprised to see me here?Well, as it turns out, a certain someone invited me to move to this islandso I did. But that same person, who shall remain nameless, has up and moved away! To top it all off, as you can no doubt surmise, I've fallen victim to a most atrocious illness. Now, if you'll pardon me, my dear, I think I need to wallow in my misery alone. But we'll chat soon.

! Why yes, this is exactly what it looks like—I've moved back to ! The island I was living on wasn't so badbut in the end, I just adore this place too much to leave it behind. Anyhoo, I'm back! And I know you missed me. So, let's just pick up where we left off, shall we?

My goodness, , it feels like it's been forever, doesn't it? Now, I know what you're thinking "What's SHE doing here?"Well, I meant to tell you sooner, darling, but I have officially moved back to ! And you know what? It was the right decision. I mean, of course it was— because YOU'RE here, !

Oh, , I'm sorry. I meant to tell you soonerAs you may have guessed I've moved back to the islandMy apologies, but I've taken ill. This is certainly NOT how I imagined our reunion would be. I'm sorry, I'm no good like this. I just need some peace and quiet until I recover. Until then

Oh my word! ? That's right, I forgot you lived here!It's me, ! I just moved to today.Oh, but look at me, acting all stiff and formal. We don't need any of that, now, do we?Now that I know you live here too, I'm positive this is where I belong. This will be such fun, !

! Is that you? It's me, ! We met on , remember? Well, wouldn't you know, I've moved HERE, to ! What a delightful coincidence. Now we can see one another whenever we want! This is going to be too much fun, darling!

Well! If it isn't ! My goodness, do you live HERE on ? Do you not recognize me? I used to live on . It's me, . Remember? Of course you do, darling. Anyhoo, I've moved here! I'm officially a resident of .Now that we've been reacquainted, I simply can't wait to become the best of friends, .

It can't be! Is it really you, ? Do you live on this island? It's me, . We met on , didn't we? Well, I recently moved here! The two of us living on this island together—what a delightful twist of fate! Lady luck is smiling upon us!

? Funny running into you here.Did you hear? I moved here from not long ago.Oh That's right, you live here too.<10_4 /> I'm sorry, I knew that. It's just this cold is making my head so fuzzy. I'd love to chat, but maybe next time, when I'm more charming and less contagious.

There you are, ! As you can see, my dear, I took your advice and moved to this island! As you can also see, I am totally unable to entertain anyone at the moment. It's quite embarrassing. But I should have this cleaned up by tomorrow, so let's take some time to catch up soon, .

Oh my! , did you come all the way here just to see little ol' me? You just HAD to see for yourself, didn't you, my dear?Well, here I am! I picked up and moved to just like you suggested. Now, I have GOT to finish unpacking. But thank you for stopping by to check in on me, .

Well, Are you surprised?As you can see, I wasted no time moving to this island. And what a charming island it is! It was love at first sight. Really! And I have you to thank for inviting me here, . Oh! I do hope it continues to live up to my expectations!Well, I should be all settled in by tomorrow. Then we can start talking each other's ears off!

! Can you believe it? Just as I promised you on that islandI've moved here! You didn't doubt me, now, did you? Well, even if you did, it's a lovely island and everyone is delightful. Best of all, YOU'RE here. And I can't thank you enough. This was just the change I needed, .

Oh, !Didn't I tell you on that island that I would move here? And here I am, !To tell you the truth, I started packing right after I made that promise.And now, at last, it's time to take a break from unpacking and start enjoying my fabulous new island life! But first, I must thank you for introducing me to my marvelous new home. You are simply the best!

, ! As you can see, I managed to make it here in one piece. I'm sorry it's taken me so long to say hello. It's justI've been busy falling in love with ! I'm SO glad you decided to chat with me on that island! I can't wait to see you around, neighbor!

Why, hello there! Remember me?<10_4 /> I'm . We met on that island that one time. You invited me to come live on your island, remember? And guess what I moved here almost immediately! I didn't see you around for so long, I was worried you had moved away. I'm so glad you didn't, .

Oh! ! You came to see meOh dear. You invited me to move here to when we met on that other islandso I did. But then I went and caught this horrid cold. Ugh, I'm so sorry.I have so much I want to tell you, bu—bu—buhhh—but it'll have to wait until I beat this, .

There you are, ! As you can see, my dear, I took your advice and moved to this island! As you can also see, I am totally unable to entertain anyone at the moment. It's quite embarrassing. But I should have this cleaned up by tomorrow, so let's take some time to catch up soon, .

Oh my! , did you come all the way here just to see little ol' me? You just HAD to see for yourself, didn't you, my dear?Well, here I am! I picked up and moved to just like you suggested. Now, I have GOT to finish unpacking. But thank you for stopping by to check in on me, .

Well, Are you surprised?As you can see, I wasted no time moving to this island. And what a charming island it is! It was love at first sight. Really! And I have you to thank for inviting me here, . Oh! I do hope it continues to live up to my expectations!Well, I should be all settled in by tomorrow. Then we can start talking each other's ears off!

! Can you believe it? I moved to the island, just like I promised at the campsite! You didn't doubt me, now, did you? Well, even if you did, it's a lovely island and everyone is delightful. Best of all, YOU'RE here! And I can't thank you enough. This was just what I needed, .

Oh, ! I told you I would move here when I was at the campsiteand here I am! To tell you the truth, I started packing right after you invited me.And now, at last, I can take a break from UNpacking and start enjoying life on this island, ! But first, I must thank you for introducing me to my marvelous new home. You are simply the best!

! Can you believe I'm here? I can barely believe it myself, . I'm sorry it's taken me so long to say hello. I've just been so busy falling in love with !I am so very glad you suggested I move here when I was at the campsite! Well, neighbor, I look forward to seeing you around.

Why, hello there! Remember me? I'm . We met at the campsite! You invited me to come live on this island, remember? Well, after that, I moved here. I didn't see you around for so long, I wasn't able to tell you. Well, I'm so happy to see you now, .

Oh! ! You came to see meYou invited me to move here when I was at the campsiteso I up and moved here.But then I went and caught this horrid cold. Ugh, I'm so sorry.I have so much I want to tell you, bu—bu—buhhh—but it'll have to wait until I beat this, .

Well, if it isn't ! Surprise, darling! I live here now!You see, I was at the campsite when invited me to move to the island, so I did! I live here now! Isn't it wonderful? But enough of that. I must get this mess sorted out. Just you wait and see. I'll have my new home looking fabulous in no time, !

Oh, ! You'll never guess what!I was visiting the campsite when insisted that I move to this island for good. So here I am! I'm a resident as of TODAY! Just like you!I simply can't wait to get to know each other better, neighbor.But first, I must turn this mess into a home. It won't take long, so let's chat soon.

Oh, ! I wonder, did you hear the news yet?I was visiting the campsite with when they hinted that I should move HERE. So I did! I packed my bags and moved, . I am an official resident and everything! So far your island has lived up to ALL my expectations. But do feel free to impress me even more, if you like.

If it isn't ! I bet you can't guess what I'm doing here on your island! WellI live here now! practically begged me to move here while we were at the campsite together. I couldn't possibly bear to see the poor dear disappointed, so I said yes. And here I am! Anyhoo, it'll be lovely to see you around the island, .

My goodness, ! I haven't seen you in ages, even though we live on the same island.Yes, you heard right I live here now!I was visiting the campsite when suggested I move here for good. So I did just that! I mean, look at this place, darling! It suits my tastes perfectly. And best of allyou're here, .

I'm terribly sorry I haven't had a chance to say hello to you yet. You seeI was visiting the campsite when invited me to move to this island for good. Sohere I am, and sick as can be.Oh curlers! I hate for you to see me like this. Let's talk when I'm better company, .

! You're NOT going to believe this, but I JUST moved here! To THIS island.But listen to this I decided to move here because I was invited by a friend of mine who lived here. I was visiting the campsite and moving seemed like such a FAB idea at the time. But when I arrived, I discovered that my friend had up and moved away! Can you believe it?! So RUDE!Well, I won't let that bother me. YOU live here, and that's what really matters, .

! You have NO idea how much I was hoping I'd run into you, ! I was visiting the campsite when a friend from invited me to move here. So, silly me, I moved just like they suggested. But when I got hereI found out that the so-called friend who invited me doesn't even live here anymore! Oh, , seeing your friendly face makes me feel so much less out of place. I mustn't go on wallowing in self-pity. It's terrible for my complexion. I'll be fine. I truly will.

Oh, Are you surprised to see me here?You see, I was visiting the campsite when a certain resident invited me to move here. So I did. But that same someone, who shall remain nameless, has up and moved away, it turns out. To top it off, I've fallen victim to this utterly atrocious illness.I'm so sorry, but I think I need to wallow in self-pity for a while. But we'll chat soon, .

Oh, ! I'm here! I made it, darling!Our time at the campsite together was just marvelous! And you invited me to move here, you silly thing! Well, now I'm here and ready to find out if is truly everything you said it would be. Ah, but first, I really must get things around here organized You know how moving can be, .Let's get together tomorrow and hang out, shall we?

Oh! ! You must have rushed right over to see me, darling. I just got here today! I must say, our time at the campsite was so special. I can't thank you enough for inviting me to move here. Alas, this room isn't going to organize itself. But I should have everything unpacked today. So let's spend some quality time together soon, .

Ohh! !I'm sure you wanted to see me as soon as you could, but I'm still unpacking, andit's a sty in here! Haha! It's alright. I totally understand, my dear.I, too, have been beside myself with excitement ever since you invited me to move here at the campsite. So, let's talk as soon as I'm unpacked. I can't wait to hear ALL the gossip, .

Well, , here I am.I was quite flattered that you thought I would be a nice addition to your little slice of paradise here. I never thought a visit to a campsite, of all things, would change my life!So we're neighbors now! Let's get together for some tea and gossip, shall we?

! I moved here, ! Aren't you pleased? After all, I owe it all to you.You wouldn't stop bragging about this island when we were at the campsite together, remember? Of course I HAD to see for myself what all the fuss was about. And so far, so good, my dear.Anyhoo, we're neighbors now, so don't you be a stranger.

! I'm so happy to see you again. It's practically a reunion, my dear!I hope you remember our time at the campsite as fondly as I do.I suppose you must, seeing how you invited me to move here.Anyhoo, this island's population has just gone up by one!Nowlet's see if is ready for like moi!

?! It's me! ! Do you remember me? What am I saying? Of COURSE you remember me. From the campsite, darling. Your invite took me by surprise but here I am!Let's do lunch sometime, yes? We have so much to talk about, !

Cough! Cough! Oh It's you , rightWell, I did as you suggested back at the campsite. I moved here.Though I don't think this island has taken to me quite as much as I've taken to it. Because as soon as I got here, I caught this horrific cold. <10_10 />AAAACHOOOO!<10_9 /> Why don't we catch up when I'm back to my old self, .

Oh, ! It's me. !We met at the campsitethe one here on this island, remember?Yes, well, invited me to move here. So here I am!I just got in today, in fact. I can hardly believe I'm a permanent resident myself. Well, neighbor, it will be lovely to see you around, .

! You remember meright?We met at the campsite. The name's .I must tell you, while I was at the campsite, invited me to moveto this very island! Ah, but my place is a terrible mess. I simply can't let myself chat until it's tidied up You know how it is. But after that we should dig into ALL the gossip! I can't wait, !

Oh, . It's been a while! Since we met at the campsite, I believe. You may not know this, but back then invited me to move to this island. And that's why I'm here! I'm your neighbor, darling. For good!I promise you're going to LOVE having me around, .

Well, if it isn't ! Hmm. It seems like forever ago that I saw you at the campsite. You know, it was during that vacation that I decided to move to this island for good. invited me so enthusiastically, I couldn't possibly say no. I suppose that means I'm your neighbor now. I do hope you're as excited as I am, .

Why, ! Hello!We met at the campsite on this island. Remember?That was when invited me to move here. They really talked this place up too! Life here sounded almost too good to be true. So, of course, I had to see for myself! Well, I'm so glad we ran into each other at last. Let's get together and dish soon, !

Is that you, ? Achooo! We met at the campsite. You might not remember. In fact, invited me to move here for good when I was there visiting. So we're neighbors <10_10 />BLAAAAACHOOOIE!<10_9 />It's just my luck. I finally run into you again, but I've fallen ill.Hopefully I'll feel better soon and we can catch up, .

Well, well, fancy meeting you here, . Darling, you are NOT going to believe this, but I JUST moved here! It's true!But listen to this I was staying at the campsite here when a friend invited me to move here for good. Then, when I arrived, I found out my friend had up and moved away! Can you believe it?! So RUDE!Well, I won't let that bother me. YOU live here, and that's what really matters, .

! You have NO idea how much I was hoping I'd run into you, ! I was visiting the campsite when a friend invited me to move here.It sounded fun, so I moved like they suggested. But when I got hereI found out that so-called friend doesn't even live here anymore! They justleft. Oh, , seeing your friendly face makes me feel so much better. I will NOT keep wallowing in self-pity. It's going to be great here. And you, my dear, are proof of that.

Oh, You must be so surprised to see me here, .You see, I was visiting the campsite when a certain resident invited me to move here. So I moved! But that someone, who shall remain nameless, has up and left the island! So RUDE! To top it off, I've fallen victim to this awful cold. I'm just a mess, darling.I'm sorry. I think I need to wallow in self-pity for a while. But let's chat soon.
